title: Client Side Routing
description: React Aria components like Link, Menu, Tabs, Table, and others can make elements act as links that navigate when you click 'em. These components take the href prop, making 'em render an anchor tag. Props like target and download work too.

title: Introduction
description: Dive into a witty adventure with this open-source design system, crafted with React Aria components. Unravel the mystery of missing props in your React app and master top-notch troubleshooting tips and best practices to keep your props from pulling a disappearing act.

Absolutely killer work! Thanks for setting such a high bar!"]}),"
",t(n.h2,{id:"whats-the-scoop-on-react-aria",children:t(n.a,{className:"not-prose subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#whats-the-scoop-on-react-aria",children:"What's the scoop on React Aria?"})}),"
",t(n.p,{children:"React Aria is like a toolbox of bare-bones React components and hooks that help you whip up accessible, top-tier UI components without the fuss. It's got all the essentials accessibility, international vibes, slick interactions, and smart behavior baked right in. This lets you pour all your energy into crafting your unique style and flair instead of sweating over the complex bits. Tested on all sorts of devices and with all kinds of tech aids, React Aria ensures everyone gets a smooth experience, no matter their setup."}),"
",t(n.h2,{id:"why-react-aria",children:t(n.a,{className:"not-prose subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#why-react-aria",children:"Why React Aria?"})}),"
